An prime example of rpk having turned, when rba allegations first surfaced many years ago, he was one of the first to disprove it. Now you can see him screaming rba rba whenever it comes to dap n chinese. Sigh, and to think I once stood in the rain in ss2 to listen to his speech back in 2008

In a ofice politic scenarioImagine ur colleague give u false info and u fight based on that which later turn out to be wrong, and that person later abandon u and when u decided to part away they tell everyone u r a mole and ask everyone to hate u while they pretend to be victim hero saint etcIs ur colleague good person? Or r u evil?
But question here is, how reliable is your words since everything you says now is outright lies and crazy stuff?
Imagine u been push afore bcos people know u r brazen to the point like madman xD

Its like asking if a person take revenge on unjust heap on him, is he bad? If he success, is justice being serve? If he fails , is justice being serve? It looks like wether he succes or fail, justice still being serve, which makes a peculiar caseThe world is a peculiar place

Liar liar. RpK doesn't worry about hell anywayWhy he take it personal? Puih.Lol.LKS is people representative. Who is this outcast? Puak dedak poison pen low class.

A madman wouldnt care about that
History is written by victorsThat makes the world a peculiar place and not uthopia
Not talking about history or victors. Just asking does what rpk writes and claims have any credibility?
Politic is always full of deceit and insidiousThose stay on top for decades r the one plays the game damn well, be it from barang naik or oppo phone
So is rpk full of deceit and insidious?
Depend who is being seen as victor or loser here

he admitted he has knowledge of the ruler who has been briefed and is aware of the matter. he did not say he has been reliably informed of who the Ruler is.can you see his play with words? Now he claims he never said what he said but it was someone else telling him all those things. if it is merely hearsay, why would he say he has knowledge of who the Ruler is? he should just say he has been reliably informed and not that he has knowledge who the Ruler is and is aware of the matter.You see the bullshit spin RPK likes to do? hahaahahha. internet is a wonderful thing. you can't hide your past so easily.
You be the judge of that yourself. Read from both source and think.See my bookmark. I read news from both side.
I didn't know about victor/loser, only truth. Was he really betrayed n ill treated, or just an elaborate excuse to justify his turning?
Stop reading at RPK...
Dia tak cakap pun yang kak mah ada kat situ. Dia cuma cakap ada orang yang dipercayai telah beritahu dia yang kak mah ada kat situ. Itulah bahasa orang law kalau nak tahu.
If you have time, read all his article since Bersih 1 and make your decision whether hes lying or not. I'll quote his favorite phrase "I told you so".
I've been reading his articles since early 00's so you don't have to advise me on this. And coming from a chinese hater like you, your advise is not appreciated anyway
lol."I have been reliably informed" Ye lah, based on that you also percaya lah.
Percaya what? Percaya that someone he trusted told him that kak mah was there?

You need to learn to read. He did not say he was reliably informed the ruler knows who the person is. He says the ruler indeed knows who the person is.  If rpk himself isn't sure who the person is, how then can he be sure that whoever the ruler knows is indeed the correct person. Oh well, probably too difficult for you to digest anyway.Btw, the word ABU originated from him. So enough of fhe "oh rpk was betrayed" crap please. Even before altantuya story he was already chanting ABU. Now that he is switching sides, he is conveniently blaming Anwar for everything .And have you ever wondered why is it that despite him claiming that whatever he was told was false, he had never revealed who the informer was? If my informer has been lying to me from day one and I found out about it, the first thing I would have done is to tell the whole world who the informer is. After all the person betrayed me. But rpk has not done so until today. Why? Obviously because it is all a cock and bull story. After all what has he got to lose? He already claimed that he is no longer afraid of anything anyway.
